title: As an institute...
statements: we need to keep track of our collective knowledge
we need to create a community (beyond the program)
we need to archive the different stages of a research project, including all its audiovisual material, in order to preserve it
we need our researchers to be able to exchange knowledge
we need to provide appropriate work environment for researchers
we need to be able to provide an overview of the different outcomes (people + process)
we need to able to explain by example what we do and how we do it
we need to able to show what we do to accreditors
we need the research (in progress) to be presented in a way that it’s clear for external examiners
we need to have a calendar with events from the institute, researchers and the alumni
we need to be able to share the exam material with examiners
we need to be able to export (parts) of the platform
we need to be able to keep track of the progress
we need to be able to easily gather exam material
we need to have an overview of the submitted exam material
we need to make sure that exam material can’t be changed after it’s submitted so that it will never get lost

title: As a first year researcher...
statements: I need a library of references
I need general info on the course in a general space (a reading list, schedule etc)
I need to be able to easily present my research (e.g. for an exam)
I need to be able to quickly capture ideas so that I don’t have to think about it anymore
I need to be able to restructure in order for the research to evolve
I need to be able to store everything in one place so that I can find it easily
I need to be able to structure in order to get an overview
I need to be in control of who has access so that I feel comfortable to try out things
I need to be able to see everything at once in order to find focus
I need the platform to be very accessible / easy to use so that I can easily incorporate it in my daily routine
I need to be able to get feedback from others (peers/mentors/externals) in order to learn
I need to be able to start over with a blank page in order for the research to evolve
I need the platform to complement the tools I already use (not to be a third inbox)
I need to be able to see my research (material) from a different angle in order for it to evolve (a.i. perspective)
I need to be able to revisit my previous thoughts in order to look at it from a different perspective
I need to be able to see what has been done before in order to build on the past
I need to be able to organise my material in different visual ways (a wall, stream, grid…)
I need to be able to give feedback on others
I need to have full control on how my research looks

title: As a second year researcher...
statements: I need to show my research for it to exist beyond the academy
I need to have full control on how my research looks
I need to be able to get feedback from others (peers/mentors/externals) in order to learn
I need to be in control of who has access so that I feel comfortable to try out things
I need to be able to organise my material in different visual ways (a wall, stream, grid…)
I need to be able to revisit my previous thoughts in order to look at it from a different perspective
I need to be able to store everything in one place so that I can find it easily
I need the platform to be very accessible /easy to use so that I can easily incorporate it in my daily routine
I need to be able to find (potential) collaborators
I need the platform to complement the tools I already use (not to be a third inbox)
I need to be able to give feedback on others
I need referencing to places outside the platform

title: As an alumnus...
statements: I need to be able to keep using the platform for ongoing research
I need to be able to present my research as an online publication so that I can share it
I need to be able to maintain ownership of my data and access levels
I need to be able to look back on what I’ve done, step by step, so that I can see what I have overlooked before
I need to be able to share public events
I need to be able to show/explain outsiders what I’ve done during the program
I need to be able to contact others and others to contact me
I need to be able to find up-to-date contact information so that I can maintain my network
I need to be able to keep up with everything that is being done at the program

title: As an examiner...
statements: I need to be able to easily access all relevant material
I need to be able to give feedback on specific material
I need to be able to get an overview of the process (previous steps)
I need to be able to get an introduction to a research(er)
I need to be able to give an assessment
I need to be able to navigate between different historical researches easily
I need a formatted quick overview / cover sheet

title: As a feedback provider...
statements: I need to be able to navigate between different researches, researchers and topics easily
I need to be able to quickly see the current status of a research
I need indications from researchers what to consider and how
I need to be able to browse all the research that has been done
I need to be able to follow each step taken in a research
I need to be able to search what has been done before
I need to be able to give precise feedback (a specific sentence / moment)
I need to be able to request access
I need a central portal where I can effectively communicate with all researchers
I need a concrete question in order to give good feedback
I need the research material to be edited in order to give good feedback
I need to be able to record my feedback as audio along video
I need to be able to find contact information

title: As an outsider...
statements: I need to be guided into the research / the master of film as a context
I need to be able to search specific researches, researchers
I need to be able to navigate between different researches, researchers and topics easily
I need to be able to get in contact with a researcher
I need to be seduced
I need to have simple choices so that I won’t get lost
I need to be able to know where I am on the homepage, what I can find here and what not?
I need to be able to follow each step taken in a research
